top_opportunities.name: Distressed Incumbent Acquisition Play
top_opportunities.thesis: Incumbents filing restructuring notices and AI-transition challenges. Their customer contracts, licenses, and relationships become available. Acquire distressed assets, run them on agentic stack.
key_data: Companies flagged: KBW, INC.  (CIK 0001063494), NVIDIA CORP  (NVDA)  (CIK 0001045810), Emrise CORP  (CIK 0000854852)
top_opportunities.vc_hook: Buy the customer base for pennies, operate it at 10x lower cost with agents.

top_opportunities.name: Labor-Intensive Services Disruption
top_opportunities.thesis: Unit labor costs rising while productivity stagnates. Industries with 60%+ labor cost ratios face existential squeeze. Agentic-first entrant captures the cost delta.
top_opportunities.vc_hook: Every dollar of wage inflation makes the AI cost advantage wider — this is a self-reinforcing moat.

top_opportunities.name: Demographic Gap — AI Fills the Shortage
top_opportunities.thesis: Job openings persistently high in specific sectors while workforce ages out. AI/agentic systems fill roles that literally cannot be staffed. Regulatory tailwind: solving shortage, not displacing.
top_opportunities.vc_hook: Not replacing workers — filling roles nobody can fill. Solves a crisis, not just saves money.

top_opportunities.name: Infrastructure Overhang Exploitation
top_opportunities.thesis: AI inference costs dropping 10x/year. Businesses designed around current cost curves will see margins explode as costs collapse. Build at the cost floor, ride the curve down.
key_data: LLM API Pricing 2026 - Compare 300+ AI Model Costs
LLM API Pricing Comparison (2025): OpenAI, Gemini, Claude
top_opportunities.vc_hook: Every quarter, the same product costs less to run. Margins go up automatically.

top_opportunities.name: Dead Business Model Revival (AI Economics)
top_opportunities.thesis: Business models that failed due to unit economics or coordination costs may now work with agentic infrastructure. The market already validated demand — only the cost side killed them.
key_data: Simple Steps to Improve Your Startup's Unit Economics and ... - HackerNoon
top_opportunities.vc_hook: The market proved the demand exists. AI just fixed the supply side.
